column2: an A.M. Eatery////Stopped in on a Friday morning and parking was non existent. I ended up parking a few blocks away then a minimal wait inside. I had the Snooze Classic
column4: but not really worth the hassle of the parking and wait time. Service was lacking as there was another wait to get service at the table
column5: and then when I did recieve my food they left the bacon off my plate. Although they did quickly remedy the issue
